bridge-type.label: JADE agent container
bridge-type.description: The Agent container represents the infrastructure to run an agent in.

parameter.name: mtpAddress
parameter.label: MTP Address
parameter.description: The address of the JADE MTP (message transport protocol), where the GroupCoordinator agent is available. (e.g. 132.252.61.116)

parameter.name: mtpPort
parameter.label: MTP Port
parameter.description: The port of the JADE MTP (message transport protocol), where the GroupCoordinator agent is available. (e.g. 7778)

parameter.name: mtpProtocol
parameter.label: MTP Protocol
parameter.description: The used protocol of the JADE MTP (message transport protocol). (e.g. HTTP/HTTPS)

parameter.name: platformName
parameter.label: Platform Name
parameter.description: The name of the JADE platform, where the GroupCoordinator agent is available. (e.g. 132.252.61.116:1099/JADE)

parameter.name: centralAgentName
parameter.label: Central Agent Name
parameter.description: The name of the CentralExecutiveAgent. (e.g. CeExAg)
